value:
This is a really pretty beach. Blue
skies and a pleasant breeze... I want
to show it to everyone in the village!

My dream is to become the best
there is, just like Captain Jeralt. I
can't stop training, even at the beach!

I can't afford anything fancy. But
those frozen treats at the stall...
No, resist! Be responsible!

I don't wear them often, but I like
swimsuits. You feel nice and cool,
and they're easy to move around in!

Quite the catch, huh? I'm pretty good
at fishing, you know. And I can cook
it up nicely too!

You're $Nf's
friend, right?$k$pI just caught some fish from the sea.
I'll share them with you!

So, what do you think of my skills?
Maybe summertime and I are a good
match!

That's the spirit! I think I'm getting
the hang of it.

Maybe I spent too much time
fishing... Captain Jeralt's best
apprentice should do better.

Do you like sunflowers? They start
to bloom in summer, you know.

I'm Leonie Pinelli. I hate to lose, so
I'm gonna enjoy the summer sea
more than anyone else!

I'm not confident in my ability to
judge a person's character, but
you, $Nu...$k$pYou brought me to this amazing
beach. I know you're a good person,
and I'm grateful.$k$pI'm from a small village. I borrowed
money to enter the Officers Academy
so I could achieve my dream.$k$pAnd... I've been training hard so I
won't fall behind the nobles. So they
can't look down on me, a commoner.$k$pBut, in front of this vast open sea,
I've felt like focusing on nobles and
commoners is kind of a waste of time.$k$pI want to open myself up to more,
just like Captain Jeralt. And just
like the sea!
でやっ
沈め！
わあっ
何すんだ…！
Even the sea's outmatched!
A storm's comin' your way!
That all you got?
This means war!
Leg cramp...
ははっ
Fine waves, soft breeze... Yup, it's a good day.
Oh! You brought drinks? Nice, thanks.
Hilda insisted I decorate my bow. It looks pretty silly, but it still shoots fine.
The scenery's nice, long as you don't think about the creepy-crawlies lurking under the rocks. Eugh.
The fish around here must make for great eating.
The break's been nice, but I'll have to work double to make up for it later.
Hey, what are you sitting around for? The waves are amazing! C'mon, let's go!
I'm top tier.
Sure is hot...
Let's get to swimming.
